activities: We provide patient self-service robotics and software that integrate with healthcare providers' information systems to assist in the delivery of medication, electronic collection of patient information, and other patient services. This is done through collection of patient's personal and insurance information, as well as biometric information such as from palm-vein scanners.
eucountries: Denmark, France, Germany, Italy, Norway, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Patient healthcare, insurance, and biometric information
